name: Code Red II
description:
My entry for the A Game By Its Cover 2017 game jam, and inspired by the Famicase entry by Tek-Man (Patrick Gordon).

This is a top down shooter with tank based movement that is basically a single boss battle. Very simple. I do consider this a complete project however, and the updates will most likely only be bug fixes.

Development

This game is built on top my implementation of the top down shooter in Sebastian Lague's Unity Create a Game Tutorial Series that I completed roughly 3 months prior to the start of the #AGBIC game jam and have since worked on in the hopes of making a complete game right up until I discovered the game jam. The source code with the full commit history is available on github.

The game also uses a few free to use 3rd party assets, mainly sound effects and music. Details can be found in the readme file.
